title: Item Entity Schema
description: Defines the structure for an Item entity, inheriting from the base entity schema and adding item-specific components.

components.description: Components defining the item's properties. Must include Name component. Inherits other components.

DefinitionRef.description: (Optional) Holds a reference ID to a base definition, linking this item instance entity to its item definition template. Definition imported from common schema.

Name.description: The display name of the item. Definition imported from common schema.

Description.description: (Optional) Static text description of the item. Definition imported from common schema.

Item.description: Core component identifying this as an item and its basic properties.

Usable.description: Optional component defining direct use effects, conditions, and targeting.

Equippable.description: Optional component defining if and how the item can be equipped.

Position.description: (Optional) Component for items whose location is relevant (e.g., placed in world). Definition imported from common schema.

Openable.description: (Optional) Component for items that can be opened/closed (e.g., a box). Definition imported from common schema.

Lockable.description: (Optional) Component for items that can be locked/unlocked (e.g., a chest). Definition imported from common schema.

Container.description: (Optional) Component for items that can hold other items (e.g., a bag, box). Definition imported from common schema.

Edible.description: (Optional) Marker component indicating an item can be eaten. Definition imported from common schema.

LiquidContainer.description: (Optional) Component for items that can contain liquids (e.g., a bottle, waterskin). Definition imported from common schema.

Pushable.description: (Optional) Component for items that can be pushed (e.g., a heavy crate item). Definition imported from common schema.
